content:
After chasing after the lutrinal for the better part of an hour, you've either convinced the lutrinal you mean it no harm, or it's simply grown tired of playing. Whichever it is, it doesn't flee as you approach this time, and it seems much calmer.

A) Guide the lutrinal home. Discard all   from the Lost Lutrinal and attach the HELPING HAND mission to it. Get the lutrinal to a location on the surface with a water feature in play and clear it with   to release it.

B) Maybe it likes being down here. Discard the Lost Lutrinal. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
